page.title: 11Samantha's story
page.content: I am Samantha and I live in Stock Lane at the top of Vicarage Road which is in area we are studying.I am eight years old and I live with my mummy and daddy my two brothers,David who is six years old and Terry who is one years old.My daddy works with computers and he often works away from home. I go to Whaddon First School with my friends who live in Whaddon, Nash and Beachampton.There are thirty nine children in my school. In September I am going to Great Horwood Combined School with seven of my friends. Abus will take us to our new school.My daddy is going to work to work in America for a little while and we are flying out to join him for a holiday.
